Description.Text: The Colibra hotel is situated in the quiet Wolska Street, 5 km from the centre of Warsaw and roughly 10 km away from the airport. The hotel is close to bus and tramway stations, which allows guests to get to the city centre in a few minutes. Within walking distance guests can also find the Wolna shopping centre, as well as numerous restaurants and bars.The rooms are spacious and classically furnished. They are all equipped with a work desk and free Internet connection. The Colibra hotel is perfect for guests visiting Warsaw on business or for pleasure. Its excellent situation near the motorway provides easy access to Moscow and Berlin.Guests can enjoy a varied breakfast buffet at the hotel's restaurant every morning, where they can also taste traditional Polish cuisine. The bar is a great place to unwind after a long day of work or sightseeing.
